page.title: 13Radio Victory
page.content: Opened on 14th Oct 1975,{Radio {Victory}covers the Portsmouth area, Isle of Wight and from Bognor Regis to Eastleigh. Transmission is on{257MW and{95VHF}in stereo with 5 full time and 10 part time presenters (DJ's). Nearly{300 records}are played each day with Â£3 being paid to the record companies for each play. There are about 15,000 LP's and about 8,000 singles in their record library. The jingles and commercials are made in a special room; a famous personality might earn Â£500. The sales department arranges adverts and one room is concerned with special effects. Radio Victory, linked to{Independent Radio {News,}covers local & national news, traffic conditions and sport. Many competitions take place and there is a linkline to help trace lost property. -Clare Farmer:Penhale Middle School
